install.description: Simple Pop-Up - It will display a FancyBox Pop-Up on any page where added in an article...

param.name: spu_aligntext
param.label: Align text
param.description: Text alignment in the Pop-Up box.

param.name: spu_boxheight
param.label: Pop-up box height (in pixels)
param.description: Pop-up box height (in pixels). Set it to [auto] to grow as needed on height.

param.name: spu_autodimensions
param.label: Auto Dimensions
param.description: The Pop-Up box will shape according to content.
